description: Retrieves the summaries of all insights in the specified group matching the provided filter values.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time frame in which the insights started. The start time can't be more than 30 days old.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time frame in which the insights ended. The end time can't be more than 30 days old.

nested_items.name: InsightSummaries
nested_items.description: The summary of each insight within the group matching the provided filters. The summary contains the InsightID, start and end time, the root cause service, the root cause and client impact statistics, the top anomalous services, and the status of the insight.

nested_items.name: InsightId
nested_items.description: The insights unique identifier.

nested_items.name: GroupARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the group that the insight belongs to.

nested_items.name: GroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the group that the insight belongs to.

nested_items.name: Names
nested_items.description: (string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: Categories The categories that label and describe the type of insight.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the insight.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time, in Unix seconds, at which the insight began.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time, in Unix seconds, at which the insight ended.

nested_items.name: Summary
nested_items.description: A brief description of the insight.

nested_items.name: ClientRequestImpactStatistics
nested_items.description: The impact statistics of the client side service. This includes the number of requests to the client service and whether the requests were faults or okay.

nested_items.name: FaultCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that have resulted in a fault,

nested_items.name: OkCount
nested_items.description: The number of successful requests.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests to the service.

nested_items.name: RootCauseServiceRequestImpactStatistics
nested_items.description: The impact statistics of the root cause service. This includes the number of requests to the client service and whether the requests were faults or okay.

nested_items.name: FaultCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that have resulted in a fault,

nested_items.name: OkCount
nested_items.description: The number of successful requests.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests to the service.

nested_items.name: TopAnomalousServices
nested_items.description: The service within the insight that is most impacted by the incident.

nested_items.name: Names
nested_items.description: (string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time, in Unix seconds, that the insight was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token.
